## Control bullet size and animation with classes

:::{.extra-large .incremental}
- MathJax works: $$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}$$
- Incremental points come in and de-emphasize themselves
:::

Use `.tiny`, `.small`, `.medium`, `.large`, `.extra-large`, and `huge` classes to control text size. Use `.incremental` to add one-by-one.
